00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 void
00088 GrAnimXForm::SetToIdentity()
00089 {
00090         _rotate.SetX( 0.0f );
00091         _rotate.SetY( 0.0f );
00092         _rotate.SetZ( 0.0f );
00093         _rotate.SetW( 1.0f );
00094         _translate.SetX( 0.0f );
00095         _translate.SetY( 0.0f );
00096         _translate.SetZ( 0.0f );
00097         _scale.SetX( 0.0f );
00098         _scale.SetY( 0.0f );
00099         _scale.SetZ( 0.0f );
00100 }
00101 
00102 //----------------------------------------------------------
00103 void
00104 GrAnimXForm::BlendToFast( const GrAnimXForm& xform, float t )
00105 {
00106         float oneMinusT = ( 1.0f - t );
00107         _rotate.SlerpToFast( xform._rotate, t );
00108         _translate = oneMinusT * _translate + t * xform._translate;
00109         _scale = oneMinusT * _scale + t * xform._scale;
00110 }
00111 
00112 //----------------------------------------------------------
00113 void
00114 GrAnimXForm::Accumulate( const GrAnimXForm& xform )
00115 {
00116         _rotate = _rotate * xform._rotate;
00117         _translate = _translate + xform._translate;
00118         _scale += xform._scale;
00119 }
00120 
00121 //----------------------------------------------------------
00122 void
00123 GrAnimXForm::BuildMatrix( MMat4x4& mat )
00124 {
00125         static const MVec3 kOne( 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f );
00126         _rotate.SetMatrixRot( mat );
00127         mat.SetTranslate( _translate );
00128         mat.SetScale( _scale + kOne );
00129 }
